name: FeatureCardTwentyFive
description: Feature section with icon, title, description, and two-column media grid per card.

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

icon.note: LucideIcon displayed in primary-button styled container

mediaItems.note: Tuple of exactly 2 MediaItems, each with imageSrc/videoSrc and optional alt/ariaLabel

propsSchema.features: FeatureCard[] (required) - Array with title, description, icon, mediaItems (tuple of 2)
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTwentyFive
    title="Our Features"
    description="Discover what makes us different."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        title: "Advanced Analytics",
        description: "Track your metrics in real-time.",
        icon: BarChart,
        mediaItems: [
          { imageSrc: "/analytics1.jpg", imageAlt: "Analytics dashboard" },
          { imageSrc: "/analytics2.jpg", imageAlt: "Analytics charts" }
        ]
      },
      {
        title: "Team Collaboration",
        description: "Work together seamlessly.",
        icon: Users,
        mediaItems: [
          { imageSrc: "/team1.jpg", imageAlt: "Team working" },
          { imageSrc: "/team2.jpg", imageAlt: "Collaboration" }
        ]
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for features with visual examples
Each feature requires exactly 2 media items
Use relevant icons for each feature
dont: Do not use without 2 media items per feature
